import React, {Component} from 'react' import Hero from './hero' class Feedback extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', location: '', cInput: '' } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { const {name, value} = event.target this.setState({[name] : value}) } handleSubmit(event) { console.log('submit') event.preventDefault() } render () { return( <>

Our Next Stop Could Be Up To You!

Note: Please read the About section first!!

There are more places to explore and more snacks to try, and our selection is only just the beginning! Know a spot that has a delicious selection of delights? Just leave your email, location of choice, and YOUR selection of favorite treats, and we'll notify you if your location is our next stop and we may even feature your favorite treats on our main page!

Email:

Location:

Tell us about your favorite treats in the box below. Go into detail about it as well! The best treats have the best descriptions.

) } } export default Feedback
